Texts.Eng:
Evolved in the depths of a Penumbral world, the Nightar dislike light intensely. They are able warriors and capable spies.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  ^green;Darkness^reset;: ^green;Physical Res.^reset; and ^green;Damage^reset;. Draining strikes.
  Tech: ^green;Conshak^reset;(light aura, detect monsters, reflect damage. ^red;8s charge-up^reset;)
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Shadow, +^green;10^reset;% Ice
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Bio-Ooze, Poison

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  All Swords: +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance, Damage x^green;1.1^reset;. ^green;3^reset;% Shadow Burst Chance (^green;5 damage^reset;) at full Health.

  Shortswords or Daggers: +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage
  Longsword or Katana: Damage x^green;1.06^reset;
  Katana/Rapier + Dagger: +^green;1.5^reset;% Crit Chance
  2x Small Blades: Defense x^green;1.12^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed
  Shield: +^green;2 Shield Bash^reset;, +^green;25^reset;% Knockback Resist
  Whip: +^green;10^reset;% Movement Speed

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic, -^red;20^reset;% Radiation, -^red;20^reset;% Electric
  ^red;Light^reset;: Reduces ^red;Energy, Health, Physical Resistance and Damage^reset;. Cancels ^red;Drain effect^reset; of attacks.
